term.name: holism
term.source: From Greek holos: whole, complete, entire.
term.def: The idea that all things in the universe are inseparably connected. Holism is opposed to &dualism; but respects &particularism; and therefore is also generally opposed to &monism; (interconnection does not imply unity). The term is sometimes used to refer to absolute &collectivism;, but this usage is uncommon.
